title: Build Kubernetes Security on Intents, Not Rules
author: Manas Chowdhury
description: Kubernetes security is notoriously complicated, but open source Nimbus aims to simplify it with automation rather than policies and tools.
cntitle: 基于意图而非规则构建 Kubernetes 安全性
cndescription: Kubernetes 安全性出了名的复杂，但开源 Nimbus 旨在通过自动化而非策略和工具来简化它。
